name: Game-A-Week 3: TS
description:
Made in like a week and a half (this one kinda got away from me)

Small sorta-narrative puzzle game .

Z (Keyboard), A (Gamepad) - Jump

X (Keyboard), X (Gamepad) - Interact/Talk

Z (Keyboard), B (Gamepad) - Undo (when in puzzle)

Escape (Keyboard), Hold Start (Gamepad) - Close game/Exit puzzle
